official_title: A bill to amend the Voting Rights Act of 1965 and title 18, United States Code, to permit nonpartisan, nonprofit voter lotteries designed to encourage individuals to vote or to register to vote.

summary.text: National Voter Participation Act of 1982 - Amends the Voting Rights Act of 1965 to allow privately-sponsored, nonpartisan, nonprofit voter lotteries designed to encourage individuals to register to vote, or to vote.
